data.actual_result: There's something flying to the left of modal
data.expected_result: There's nothing outside of modal just like when you do it first time
data.short_description: There's something "flying" to the left when you press next button on Add payment method window
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Add Payment Method on Settings > Billing, select Credit Card - Fill the first section correctly and press 'next', observe the surrounding modal - Fill the second section. After all fields filled, press 'back' - Press 'next' again, observe the surrounding modal
